description: A collection of react loading spinners
name: react-spinners

scripts.clean: rm -rf helpers/; rm -f *Loader.js; rm -f index.js; rm -rf docs/js
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish && npm run clean
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish && npm run clean
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish && npm run clean
scripts.remove:demo: rm docs/index.html; rm docs/main*; rm docs/vendors*;
